description: This Dart file defines the GameScreen widget for a Flutter application, implementing the UI for a Tic-Tac-Toe game with space visuals. It manages game state display, user interactions, and dialog prompts for game results.

classes.name: GameScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that encapsulates the main game UI for Tic-Tac-Toe, including game status, board display, and control buttons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the game screen, including game status display, the game board grid, and action buttons.

methods.name: _showResultDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog box with the game result, indicating whether there was a winner or a draw, with options to close the dialog.
